verses.verse: It happened <S%H3414>that,<s%> when Jeremiah had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> with which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H1697>them,<s%> even all these words,

then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah,<s%> and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H2086>proud<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> You <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>falsely:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H559>say,<s%> You shall not <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to live <S%H1481>there;<s%>

but <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%> sets you <S%H5496>on<s%> against <S%H4616>us,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that they may put us to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and carry us away <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

So <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> obey the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who were <S%H7725>returned<s%> from all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where they had been <S%H5080>driven,<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

the <S%H1397>men,<s%> and the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>children,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and every <S%H5315>person<s%> who <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had <S%H3240>left<s%> with <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan;<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah;<s%>

and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> obey the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8471>Tahpanhes.<s%>
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2934>hide<s%> them in <S%H4423>mortar<s%> in the brick <S%H4404>work,<s%> which is at the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3064>Judah;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7971>Behold,<s%> I will send and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>on<s%> these <S%H68>stones<s%> that I have <S%H2934>hidden;<s%> and he shall <S%H5186>spread<s%> his royal pavilion over <S%H8237>them.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> such as are for <S%H4194>death<s%> shall be put to <S%H4194>death,<s%> and such as are for <S%H7628>captivity<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H7617>them,<s%> and carry them away captive: and he shall <S%H5844>array<s%> himself with the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> puts <S%H5844>on<s%> his <S%H899>garment;<s%> and he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from there in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

He shall also <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4676>pillars<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall he <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
